snippet: If you’re overwhelmed by the networks’ new series, GSN stands ready with a vacuous but often amusing new game show, “Mind of a Man.”
lead_paragraph: If you’re overwhelmed by the networks’ new series, GSN stands ready with a vacuous but often amusing new game show, “Mind of a Man.”

headline.main: In a Man’s Mind, Anything Goes
headline.print_headline: In a Man’s Mind, Anything Goes
